welcome_message_body: Welcome to Moanda, Congo! Get ready to be enchanted by the city's natural beauty, rich history, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Moanda has to offer.

restaurants.name: Quartier Alliance
restaurants.description: Quartier Alliance is a african restaurant located in Moanda.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Moanda Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Moanda Airport is used for the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Soyo Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cabinda Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Cabinda Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
